<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">0b32625c182202109da41bc9fe9dedd3</macroponent><name>ReportSummaryPage</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const currentSysId = event.payload.sysId;
    var items = api.data.evam_emergency_alert_composite_databroker_1.compositeDataViews.items;
    var status = false;
    items.forEach(function(property){
        if(property.propValues.model.sysId== currentSysId && property.propValues.model.status =="Status requested" ){
            status = true;
        }
    });
 if (!status){
    helpers.navigate.to("report",{
        "table":event.payload.table,
        "sysId":event.payload.sysId
    }); 
}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>f232625c6f2202104e44f05bbfde7cb4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReportSummaryPage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f232625c6f2202104e44f05bbfde7cb4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:13</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
